These pages document initial development and testing of the Northeast US (NEUS) [Atlantis](https://research.csiro.au/atlantis/) model. 

Please see also the [wiki for this repository](https://github.com/NOAA-EDAB/neus-atlantis/wiki).

Additional tools are from the atlantisom package in development at https://github.com/r4atlantis/atlantisom
